float_constant.name: CAMERA_POSITION_X
float_constant.desc: Sets camera x position in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_POSITION_Y
float_constant.desc: Sets camera y position in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_POSITION_Z
float_constant.desc: Sets camera z position in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_X
float_constant.desc: Sets camera x focus (target position) in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_Y
float_constant.desc: Sets camera y focus (target position) in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_Z
float_constant.desc: Sets camera z focus (target position) in region coordinates

integer_constant.name: OS_ATTACH_MSG_ALL
integer_constant.desc: Send the message to attachments on every point

integer_constant.name: OS_ATTACH_MSG_INVERT_POINTS
integer_constant.desc: Invert how the attachment points list should be treated

integer_constant.name: OS_ATTACH_MSG_OBJECT_CREATOR
integer_constant.desc: Send only to those have the same CreatorID with host object CreatorID

integer_constant.name: OS_ATTACH_MSG_SCRIPT_CREATOR
integer_constant.desc: Send only to those have the same CreatorID with sender script CreatorID

integer_constant.name: CHANGED_ANIMATION
integer_constant.desc: The set of animations playing on the avatar to whom this object is attached has been changed.

integer_constant.name: LIST_STAT_HARMONIC_MEAN
integer_constant.desc: Returns the harmonic mean of a list of numbers, Value 100.

integer_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_OFFSET_X
integer_constant.desc: Adjusts the camera focus x position relative to the target. (float)

integer_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_OFFSET_Y
integer_constant.desc: Adjusts the camera focus y position relative to the target. (float)

integer_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_OFFSET_Z
integer_constant.desc: Adjusts the camera focus z position relative to the target. (float)

integer_constant.name: OS_NPC
integer_constant.desc: Target is NPC. Use this instead of NPC, Value 0x01000000

integer_constant.name: OS_LISTEN_REGEX_NAME
integer_constant.desc: Process name parameter as regex, Value = 0x1

integer_constant.name: OS_LISTEN_REGEX_MESSAGE
integer_constant.desc: Process name parameter as regex, Value = 0x2

integer_constant.name: PHYS_LINKSET_TYPE_CONSTRAINT
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;Links are created with physics constraint objects. Used for flexible objects. Not a good default as it uses more CPU

integer_constant.name: PHYS_LINKSET_TYPE_COMPOUND
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;Linkset is constructed as a compound object made up of the shapes of all the children. The most efficient linkset implementation and the default

integer_constant.name: PHYS_LINKSET_TYPE_MANUAL
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;NOT IMPLEMENTED. Linkset is implemented by CPU code that moves each of the object in the linkset independently

integer_constant.name: PHYS_LINK_TYPE_FIXED
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;Link is fixed and unmovable. Default. Implemented as a 6 degree-of-freedom constraint with no motion in either the linear or angular directions

integer_constant.name: PHYS_AXIS_ALL
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;(-1) make changes to all axis

function.name: osSetRegionWaterHeight
function.desc: osSetRegionWaterHeight(float height);Adjusts water height in current region

function.name: osSetRegionSunSettings
function.desc: osSetRegionSunSettings(integer useEstateSun, integer sunFixed, float sunHour);Set the current region's sun settings

function.name: osSetEstateSunSettings
function.desc: osSetEstateSunSettings(integer sunFixed, float sunHour);Set current estate's sun settings

function.name: osGetCurrentSunHour
function.desc: float osGetCurrentSunHour();Returns the value of the current region's sun hour

function.name: osGetSunParam
function.desc: string osGetSunParam(string param);Returns region's current sun parameters.;Param are: day_length, year_length, day_night_offset, update_interval.

function.name: osSetSunParam
function.desc: osSetSunParam(string param, float value);Sets the current region's sun parameters.;Param are: day_length, year_length, day_night_offset, update_interval.

function.name: osWindActiveModelPluginName
function.desc: string osWindActiveModelPluginName();Returns active wind plugin name, specified by "wind_plugin" in OpenSim.ini

function.name: osSetWindParam
function.desc: osSetWindParam(string plugin, string param, float value);Sets value of param property for plugin module.;SimpleRandomWind plugin param is: strength.;ConfigurableWind plugin params are: avgStrength, avgDirection, varStrength, varDirection, rateChange

function.name: osGetWindParam
function.desc: string osGetWindParam(string plugin, string param);Gets the value of param property for plugin module.;SimpleRandomWind plugin param is: strength.;ConfigurableWind plugin params are: avgStrength, avgDirection, varStrength, varDirection, rateChange.

function.name: osParcelJoin
function.desc: osParcelJoin(vector start, vector end);Joins two adjacent parcels within the same region

function.name: osParcelSubdivide
function.desc: osParcelSubdivide(vector start, vector end);Subdivides a parcel into two adjacent parcels within the same region

function.name: osSetParcelDetails
function.desc: osSetParcelDetails(vector pos, list parameters);Sets parcel details;PARCEL_DETAILS_NAME, PARCEL_DETAILS_DESC, PARCEL_DETAILS_OWNER, PARCEL_DETAILS_GROUP, PARCEL_DETAILS_CLAIMDATE are implemented

function.name: osList2Double
function.desc: osList2Double(list src, integer index);This function converts a value in the specified index of the list src to the double data type. However, OSSL does not have a double data type. C# contains a double type, but the current LSL implementation does not.

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureURL
function.desc: string osSetDynamicTextureURL(key dynamicID, string contentType, string url, string extraParams, integer timer);Renders a web texture on the prim containing the script and returns the UUID of the newly created texture

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureData
function.desc: osSetDynamicTextureData(key dynamicID, string contentType, string data, string extraParams, integer timer);Renders a dynamically created texture on the prim containing the script and returns the UUID of the newly created texture

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlend
function.desc: string osSetDynamicTextureDataBlend(string dynamicID, string contentType, string data, string extraParams, integer timer, integer alpha);Allows for two dynamic textures to blend on the prim containing this script

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureDataBlendFace
function.desc: string osSetDynamicTextureDataBlendFace(string dynamicID, string contentType, string data, string extraParams, integer blend, integer disp, integer timer, integer alpha, integer face);Returns UUID of the generated texture. Intended to be used with subsequent calls to osSetDynamicTexture* functions in order to modify the texture

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlend
function.desc: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlend(key dynamicID, string contentType, string url, string extraParams, integer timer, integer alpha);Allows for two dynamic textures to blend on the prim containing this script

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlendFace
function.desc: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlendFace(key dynamicID, string contentType, string url, string extraParams, integer blend, integer disp, integer timer, integer alpha, integer face);Allows for two dynamic textures to blend on the specified face of the prim containing this script

function.name: osGetTerrainHeight
function.desc: integer osGetTerrainHeight(integer x, integer y);Returns the current region's terrain height as a float at the given coordinates

function.name: osSetTerrainHeight
function.desc: osSetTerrainHeight(integer x, integer y, float val);Sets the current region's terrain height at the given coordinates

function.name: osTerrainFlush
function.desc: osTerrainFlush();Updates terrain changes in the grid's database

function.name: osRegionRestart
function.desc: osRegionRestart(float seconds);Restarts the current region after a specified amount of time (in seconds)

function.name: osRegionNotice
function.desc: osRegionNotice(string msg);Sends a region notice throughout the current region

function.name: osConsoleCommand
function.desc: osConsoleCommand(string command);Sends a given console command to the region.;NOTE: There are no security checks with this function. DO NOT USE THIS FUNCTION UNLESS YOU ARE ABSOLUTELY SURE YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.

function.name: osSetParcelMediaURL
function.desc: osSetParcelMediaURL(string url);Set parcel media to a given url

function.name: osSetParcelSIPaddress
function.desc: osSetParcelSIPAddress(string SIPAddress);Set parcel SIP Address for voice

function.name: osSetPrimFloatOnWater
function.desc: osSetPrimFloatOnWater(integer float);Set physical object to float at the given water level

function.name: osTeleportAgent
function.desc: osTeleportAgent(key agent, integer regionX, integer regionY, vector position, vector lookat);;osTeleportAgent(key agent, string regionName, vector position, vector lookat);;osTeleportAgent(key agent, vector position, vector lookat);Teleports an agent to the specified location

function.name: osTeleportOwner
function.desc: osTeleportOwner(integer regionX, integer regionY, vector position, vector lookat);;osTeleportOwner(string regionName, vector position, vector lookat);;osTeleportOwner(vector position, vector lookat);Teleports the owner of the object containing the script to the specified location

function.name: osGetAgentIP
function.desc: string osGetAgentIP(key avatar);Returns the agent's IP Address

function.name: osGetAgents
function.desc: list osGetAgents();Returns a list of all avatars in the current region

function.name: osAvatarPlayAnimation
function.desc: osAvatarPlayAnimation(key avatar, string animation);Plays a given animation on a specified avatar.;No PERMISSION_TRIGGER_ANIMATION check.

function.name: osAvatarStopAnimation
function.desc: osAvatarStopAnimation(key UUID, string animation);Stops playing an animation on a specified avatar

function.name: osForceAttachToAvatar
function.desc: osForceAttachToAvatar(integer attach_point);Attaches the object to the avatar.;No PERMISSION_ATTACH check.

function.name: osForceAttachToAvatarFromInventory
function.desc: osForceAttachToAvatarFromInventory(string item, integer attach_point);Attaches given inventory item to the avatar.;No PERMISSION_ATTACH check.

function.name: osForceAttachToOtherAvatarFromInventory
function.desc: osForceAttachToOtherAvatarFromInventory(key avatar, string item, integer attach_point);Attaches given inventory item to a specified avatar.;No PERMISSION_ATTACH check.

function.name: osForceDetachFromAvatar
function.desc: osForceDetachFromAvatar();Detaches the object from the avatar.;No PERMISSION_ATTACH check.

function.name: osGetNumberOfAttachments
function.desc: list osGetNumberOfAttachments(key avatar, list attach_point);Returns a strided list of the specified attachment points and the number of attachments on those points

function.name: osMessageAttachments
function.desc: osMessageAttachments(key avatar, string message, list attach_point, integer flags);Sends a given message to the specified avatar's attachments on the given attachment points

function.name: osMovePen
function.desc: osMovePen(string draw_list, integer x, integer y);Moves the pen's location to the coordinates specified by the x and y parameters, without drawing anything

function.name: osDrawLine
function.desc: osDrawLine(string draw_list, integer start_x, integer start_y, integer end_x, integer end_y);osDrawLine(string draw_list, integer end_x, integer end_y);Draws a line on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawText
function.desc: osDrawText(string draw_list, string text);Renders text on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawEllipse
function.desc: osDrawEllipse(string draw_list, integer width, integer height);Draws an ellipse on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawRectangle
function.desc: osDrawRectangle(string draw_list, integer width, integer height);Draws a rectangle on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawFilledRectangle
function.desc: osDrawFilledRectangle(string draw_list, integer width, integer height);Draws a rectangle on a dynamic texture, and fills it with the current pen color

function.name: osDrawPolygon
function.desc: osDrawPolygon (string draw_list, list x, list y);Draws a polygon on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawFilledPolygon
function.desc: osDrawFilledPolygon (string draw_list, list x, list y);Draws a polygon on a dynamic texture, and fills it with the current pen color

function.name: osSetFontSize

function.name: osSetFontName
function.desc: osSetFontName(string draw_list, string font_name);Sets the font to be used by osDrawText

function.name: osSetPenSize
function.desc: osSetPenSize(string draw_list, integer pen_size);Sets the line thickness to be used when drawing dynamic textures

function.name: osSetPenColor
function.desc: osSetPenColor(string draw_list, string color);Sets the pen color to be used when drawing dynamic textures

function.name: osSetPenCap
function.desc: osSetPenCap(string draw_list, string direction, string type);Apply a shape on the end of a line

function.name: osDrawImage
function.desc: osDrawImage(string draw_list, integer width, integer height, string url);Retrieves a specified image and draws it at the specified height and width

function.name: osGetDrawStringSize

function.name: osGetSimulatorVersion

function.name: osGetThreatLevel

function.name: osParseJSONNew
function.desc: string osParseJSON(string JSON);Returns a hashtable containing the structured JSON contents

function.desc: string osGetNotecard(string notecard);Returns the full contents of a notecard

function.name: osGetNumberOfNotecardLines
function.desc: integer osGetNumberOfNotecardLines(string notecard);Returns the number of lines in a notecard

function.name: osGetGridGatekeeperURI
function.desc: string osGetGridGatekeeperURI();Returns the current grid's Gatekeeper URI as a string.

function.name: osGetGridCustom
function.desc: string osGetGridCustom();Returns the current grid's GridInfo key

function.name: osFormatString
function.desc: string osFormatString(string to_format, list strings);Formats the given string using specified parameters

function.name: osMatchString

function.name: osReplaceString

function.name: osNpcLoadAppearance

function.name: osNpcGetOwner
function.desc: key osNpcGetOwner(key npc);Returns the avatar key for the target NPC's owner

function.name: osNpcGetPos
function.desc: vector osNpcGetPos(key npc);Returns current position vector of the target NPC

function.name: osNpcGetRot
function.desc: rotation osNpcGetRot(key npc);Returns the rotation of the the target NPC

function.name: osNpcSetRot
function.desc: osNpcSetRot(key npc, rotation rot);Set the rotation of the target NPC

function.name: osNpcMoveTo
function.desc: osNpcMoveTo(key npc, vector position);Moves the target NPC to a location within the region

function.desc: osNpcMoveToTarget(key npc, vector target, integer options);Moves the target NPC to a specified location over a period of time

function.name: osNpcStopMoveToTarget
function.desc: osNpcStopMoveToTarget(key npc);Stop the target NPC's movement

function.desc: osNpcSay(key npc, string message);Target NPC says message on the nearby chat channel

function.desc: osNpcWhisper(key npc, string message);Target NPC whispers message on the nearby chat channel

function.desc: osNpcStand(key npc);Makes the target NPC stand up

function.name: osNpcTouch
function.desc: osNpcTouch(key npcKey, key object_key, integer link_num);Makes the target NPC to touch the specified object

function.name: osNpcRemove
function.desc: key osNpcRemove(key npc);Removes the NPC specified by key npc

function.name: osNpcPlayAnimation
function.desc: osNpcPlayAnimation(key npc, string animation);Plays animation on the target NPC

function.name: osNpcStopAnimation
function.desc: osNpcStopAnimation(key npc, string animation);Stops animation being played by the NPC

function.name: osOwnerSaveAppearance

function.name: osAgentSaveAppearance

function.name: osGetRegionStats
